required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Patterns of Injury and Mortality in Free-fall Trauma Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Patterns of Injury and Mortality in Free-fall Trauma Patients

brief_summary.textblock: In this study, we aimed to analyze the demographic characteristics, patterns of injury and mortality after free fall in a Taiwan level one trauma center.

detailed_description.textblock: Falls from height is the leading cause of accidental deaths. The mechanism of free-fall injury is abrupt vertical deceleration and the severity is dependent on the height, body weight, posture and contact areaâ€¦etc. Most victims presented to emergency department with major trauma, so initial evaluation and timely management are crucial for the survival. The knowledge of unique pattern of injuries helps clinicians to facilitate the diagnosis. In this study, we aimed to analyze the demographic characteristics, patterns of injury and mortality after free fall in a Taiwan level one trauma center.

primary_outcome.measure: patterns of injury and causes of mortality
primary_outcome.description: patterns of injury and causes of mortality in free-fall patients

intervention.description: only retrospective reviews for medical records

study_pop.textblock: patterns of injury and mortality after free-falls in a Taiwan level one trauma center.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- adult patients with free-fall trauma
Exclusion Criteria:
- adult patients with free-fall trauma, not relating with traffic accidents
